channel.title: Grr My mouse!
channel.description:
Hope this is the right section :|. Well EACH TIME I reset my computer my mouse doesn't start up! So there is no mouse and I'm using my Keyboard. So I un-install it and re-install it, then it works fine, But say I restart my computer again, IT doesn't start up any help?
ALSO noob question
Is winlogin.exe a virus in my task manger? And 8 svchost.exe's running o.0 Any help guys?

item.title: Grr My mouse!
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

it’s a PS/2 It’s the one that comes with the computer when you buy it, I forgot the “Code” I think “Code 9, Can not start device” I’m not sure o.0

Read full topic

item.title: Grr My mouse!
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

on the last queries, that is normal

what sort of mouse is it, usb or ps/2?
